Literature.Title: Invasive fungi-derived defensins kill drug-resistant bacterial pathogens.
Literature.Author: Wu J, Liu S, Wang H

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:8% Killing=50 µM,Mouse erythrocytes:7% Hemolysis=50 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus(LC=1.20±0.13µM),Staphylococcus aureus BNCC 340652(LC=1.71±0.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(LC=0.95±0.26µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(LC=1.11±0.03µM),Enterococcus faecalis(LC=1.62±0.67µM),Enterococcus faecium(LC=0.77±0.07µM),Enterococcus faecium VR(LC=0.97±0.039µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(no activity data),Serratia marcescens ATCC 14756(no activity data)
